mapper.sql: id, age, create_time, del_flag, empower_phone, last_login_time, name, update_time, verify_code, verdify_code_time,open_id
mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM b_recevied_info a WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.a_user_id = #{aUserId}

SELECT count(*) FROM c_entry_info a WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.a_user_id = #{aUserId}

SELECT sum(b.reward) FROM c_entry_info a INNER JOIN b_job_info b ON a.job_id = b.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.is_cash = 0 AND a.over_datetime > TO_DAYS(NOW())
AND a.a_user_id = #{aUserId}

SELECT sum(a.amount_money) FROM a_cashout_info a WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.a_user_id = #{aUserId}

SELECT a.id FROM c_entry_info a INNER JOIN b_job_info b ON a.job_id = b.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.over_datetime > TO_DAYS(NOW())
AND a.a_user_id = #{aUserId}

SELECT b.job_name jobName, b.reward, c.name, a.entry_time entryTime FROM c_entry_info a INNER JOIN b_job_info b ON a.job_id = b.id LEFT JOIN c_resume_info c ON a.resume_id = c.id WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.a_user_Id = #{aUserId} AND NOW() > a.over_datetime AND a.is_cash = 0
ORDER BY a.entry_time DESC
mapper.insert: insert into a_user_info (id, age, create_time, del_flag, empower_phone, last_login_time, name, update_time, verify_code, verdify_code_time,open_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{empowerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{verifyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verdifyCodeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

age,

mapper.update:
update a_user_info
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
empower_phone = #{empowerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
verify_code = #{verifyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
verdify_code_time = #{verdifyCodeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update a_user_info set age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, empower_phone = #{empowerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, verify_code = #{verifyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, verdify_code_time = #{verdifyCodeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
